portfolio.title: Vyaakhyan
portfolio.description: Part of a team project under a Hackathon in which we made a website Vyakhyaan. This website was for our college to schedule classes in different lecture theatres for various branches and semester whenever there is a free slot or a class gets cancelled.

portfolio.title: Transporter Manufacturer Dashboard
portfolio.description: For communication b/w Manufacturers & Transporters. Login/Signup, separate dashboard for both type of users, placing of order by manufacturer & acceptance option for transporter with fees details.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Website
portfolio.description: E-commerce Website for online shopping from a variety of prodcuts & billing like Myntra. I designed login/sign up returning to dashboard where u can add items to cart and then proceed for payment & bill. Cart History saved for a particular user.

portfolio.title: Language Learning Website
portfolio.description: A language learning place that helps users improve their language proficiency through interactive exercises and activities. A user can sign in and learn alphabets, pronunciations & can attend quizzes.

portfolio.title: Keyword Popularity Functionality
portfolio.description: Keyword search volume- means how many times that specific keyword searched on any website. This feature can be added to any e-commerce website to judge products liked by buyers.
